articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: A wind-driven grass fire northwest of Roseburg burned 6.5 acres Monday afternoon. Crews from multiple agencies stopped the fire’s spread. Officials urge residents to take precautions when using powered equipment near dry vegetation as fire season approaches.
articles.title: Wind-Driven Grass Fire Burns Over 6 Acres Northwest of Roseburg

articles.title: Crash Claims Life of 19-Year-Old Motorcyclist in Roseburg

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: A fire in the attic of a Green home Monday displaced several adults, children, and pets. Crews from CDF&R and partner agencies contained the fire in 20 minutes. The likely cause was a discarded cigarette. The American Red Cross is assisting the displaced family.
articles.title: Attic Fire Displaces Family in Green on Monday Afternoon
